channel.title: Oasis on Jude Dylan Music
channel.description: Recent content in Oasis on Jude Dylan Music

item.title: Wonderwall | Oasis
item.description: This was a joint project - a cover of the Oasis classic. Track was recorded and edited by me, as well as the instruments, and the amazing Josh is on vocals.

item.title: Half The World Away | Oasis
item.description: Half The World Away - Oasis cover. I recorded this a little while ago, and the quality is nowhere near as good as it could have been, however I thought I’d still upload it.
